Root.displayName: 舟山市政务服务网数据交换对接
Root.description: 绍兴市政务服务网数据交换对接

Service.AreaName: 舟山不动产一窗受理云平台

QuerySql.Sql: SELECT '' PROJID,'' PROJPWD,'0' IS_MANUBRIUM,gx.servicecode SERVICECODE,GX.ITEMID SERVICECODE_ID ,gx.deptid SERVICE_DEPTID ,'00' BUS_MODE ,'' BUS_MODE_DESC,gx.serviceversion SERVICEVERSION ,gx.servicename SERVICENAME,nvl(nvl(rtrim(ltrim(D.NAME_)),rtrim(ltrim(B.QLRMC))),'无') PROJECTNAME,'承诺件' INFOTYPE,'0' BUS_TYPE,'' REL_BUS_ID ,nvl(rtrim(ltrim(B.QLRMC)),'无') APPLYNAME, (select zwwyczjzl from BDCDWCX.zwwyczjzldzgx where zjzl=nvl(B.ZJZL,'99') and rownum=1) APPLY_CARDTYPE ,nvl(ltrim(rtrim(B.ZJH)),'无') APPLY_CARDNUMBER,nvl(CASE WHEN rtrim(ltrim(B.QLRMC)) IS NOT NULL THEN B.QLRMC ELSE rtrim(ltrim(B.QLRDLRMC)) END,'无') AS CONTACTMAN ,CASE WHEN B.QLRMC IS NOT NULL THEN (select zwwyczjzl from BDCDWCX.zwwyczjzldzgx where zjzl=nvl(B.ZJZL,'99') and rownum=1) ELSE (select zwwyczjzl from BDCDWCX.zwwyczjzldzgx where zjzl=B.Qlrdlrzjzl and rownum=1) END AS CONTACTMAN_CARDTYPE,nvl(ltrim(rtrim(CASE WHEN B.QLRMC IS NOT NULL THEN B.ZJH ELSE B.Qlrdlrzjh END)),'无') AS CONTACTMAN_CARDNUMBER,CASE WHEN B.YDDH IS NULL THEN NVL(B.GDDH,'2188256') ELSE B.YDDH END AS TELPHONE ,'' POSTCODE,'' ADDRESS,'' LEGALMAN ,gx.deptid DEPTID ,gx.deptname DEPTNAME ,gx.ss_orgcode SS_ORGCODE ,'584796' RECEIVE_USEID,rtrim(ltrim(sl.slr)) RECEIVE_NAME,'0' APPLYFROM ,'01' APPROVE_TYPE,'99' APPLY_PROPERTIY,TO_CHAR(A.START_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') RECEIVETIME,'' BELONGTO ,gx.areacode AREACODE ,'1' DATASTATE,gx.belongsystem BELONGSYSTEM,'' EXTEND ,TO_CHAR(A.START_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_TIME,'I' SYNC_STATUS,'1' DATAVERSION,gx.deptid STRIPECODE,'' MEMO FROM GISQBPM.ACT_HI_PROCINST A INNER JOIN GISQBPM.ACT_HI_BIZ_PROCINST D ON D.PROC_INST_ID_=A.PROC_INST_ID_ INNER JOIN (select * from (SELECT * FROM BDCDJ.QLR WHERE YWH ='{0}' and QLRlb in('1','7','9','12') and ZJH is not null order by qszt, bsm desc) q where ROWNUM=1) B ON B.YWH=A.BUSINESS_KEY_ JOIN (SELECT DJXL,YWH,slr,ssxzq FROM BDCDJ.SLSQ WHERE YWH ='{0}' AND ROWNUM=1) SL ON SL.YWH =B.YWH JOIN BDCDWCX.QLSXDYGX GX ON GX.LCDM=SL.DJXL and rownum=1 AND SL.ssxzq = GX.QXDM WHERE A.BUSINESS_KEY_='{0}'

SELECT RAWTOHEX(SYS_GUID()) UNID,'' PROJID,C.DATUM_NAME ATTRNAME,C.DATUMINST_GUID ATTRID ,C.SEQ_ORDER SORTID,'纸质收取' TAKETYPE ,CASE WHEN NVL(C.ORIGINAL_NUMBER,0)+NVL(C.COPY_NUMBER,0)+NVL(C.ELEC_NUMBER,0)>0 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS ISTAKE,NVL(C.ORIGINAL_NUMBER,0)+NVL(C.COPY_NUMBER,0)+NVL(C.ELEC_NUMBER,0) AMOUNT ,TO_CHAR(C.GXSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') TAKETIME,'' MEMO,gx.BELONGSYSTEM,gx.AREACODE ,'' EXTEND ,TO_CHAR(C.GXSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_TIME,'' FILENAME ,'I' SYNC_STATUS,'1' DATAVERSION,'' FILEURL,'654123' FILEPWD FROM GISQBPM.ACT_HI_PROCINST A INNER JOIN BDCDJ.T_XM_PROJECT B ON A.BUSINESS_KEY_=B.PROJECT_ID INNER JOIN BDCDJ.T_XM_DATUM C ON C.BIZINST_GUID=B.BIZINST_GUID inner join BDCDJ.SLSQ sl on sl.ywh=a.BUSINESS_KEY_ inner join BDCDWCX.QLSXDYGX gx on gx.lcdm=sl.djxl AND SL.ssxzq = GX.QXDM WHERE A.BUSINESS_KEY_='{0}'

SELECT '' PROJID,B.SLR ACCEPT_MAN ,gx.deptname HANDER_DEPTNAME , gx.deptid HANDER_DEPTID,gx.AREACODE,TO_CHAR(A.START_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ACCEPT_TIME ,TO_CHAR(B.BLTS) PROMISEVALUE,'工作日' PROMISETYPE,TO_CHAR(B.BJSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') PROMISE_ETIME ,gx.BELONGSYSTEM,'' EXTEND,TO_CHAR(A.START_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_TIME ,'I' SYNC_STATUS,'1' DATAVERSION FROM GISQBPM.ACT_HI_PROCINST A INNER JOIN (SELECT SLR,BLTS,BJSJ,YWH FROM BDCDJ.SLSQ WHERE YWH ='{0}' AND ROWNUM=1) B ON B.YWH=A.BUSINESS_KEY_ inner join BDCDJ.SLSQ sl on a.BUSINESS_KEY_= sl.ywh inner join BDCDWCX.QLSXDYGX gx on gx.lcdm=sl.djxl AND SL.ssxzq = GX.QXDM WHERE A.BUSINESS_KEY_='{0}'

SELECT '' PROJID,D.STAFF_NAME TRANSACT_USER ,gx.deptname HANDER_DEPTNAME,gx.deptid HANDER_DEPTID,gx.AREACODE,TO_CHAR(A.END_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') TRANSACT_TIME,'办结' TRANSACT_RESULT,'准予许可' TRANSACT_DESCRIBE ,nvl(zs.bdcqzh ,'无') RESULT_CODE,'' REMARK,gx.BELONGSYSTEM,'' EXTEND ,TO_CHAR(A.END_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_TIME,'I' SYNC_STATUS,'1' DATAVERSION FROM GISQBPM.ACT_HI_PROCINST A INNER JOIN GISQBPM.ACT_HI_TASKINST B ON A.PROC_INST_ID_=B.PROC_INST_ID_ INNER JOIN PLATFORM.BT_USER D ON D.USERNAME=B.ASSIGNEE_ inner join BDCDJ.SLSQ sl on a.BUSINESS_KEY_=sl.ywh inner join BDCDWCX.QLSXDYGX gx on gx.lcdm=sl.djxl AND SL.ssxzq = GX.QXDM LEFT join (select bdcqzh,ywh from BDCDJ.DJFZ_CQZS where ywh= '{0}' and rownum =1) zs on zs.ywh = A.Business_Key_ WHERE A.BUSINESS_KEY_='{0}' AND A.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND NVL(A.DELETE_REASON_,'-1')!='ACTIVITI_DELETED' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM GISQBPM.ACT_HI_TASKINST C WHERE C.PROC_INST_ID_=B.PROC_INST_ID_ AND C.END_TIME_>B.END_TIME_)

select UNID,d.PROJID, PHASE_CODE, HANDLESTART,NODE_NAME ,CREATE_TIME, DATAVERSION,SYNC_STATUS ,gx.belongsystem BELONGSYSTEM,gx.AREACODE,gx.servicecode,gx.deptid SERVICE_DEPTID,GX.DEPTNAME XK_LYDW,GX.ss_orgcode XK_LYDWDM from ( select min(BUSINESS_KEY_) BUSINESS_KEY_,RAWTOHEX(SYS_GUID()) UNID,'' PROJID ,PHASE_CODE, HANDLESTART,NODE_NAME ,min(CREATE_TIME) CREATE_TIME,'1' DATAVERSION,'I' SYNC_STATUS from ( SELECT A.BUSINESS_KEY_, c.PHASE_NAME,c. PHASE_CODE, c.HANDLESTART,c.NODE_NAME ,TO_CHAR(b.START_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_TIME FROM GISQBPM.ACT_HI_PROCINST A INNER JOIN GISQBPM.ACT_HI_TASKINST B ON A.PROC_INST_ID_=B.PROC_INST_ID_ inner join (select '申报' NODE_NAME,'申报阶段' PHASE_NAME,'受理' fromnodename,'01' PHASE_CODE,'收件' HANDLESTART from dual union select '申报' ,'申报阶段','收件受理' ,'01','收件' from dual union select '受理' NODE_NAME,'受理阶段' PHASE_NAME,'受理' fromnodename,'02' PHASE_CODE,'受理' HANDLESTART from dual union select '受理' ,'受理阶段','收件受理' ,'02','受理' from dual union select '审核' ,'审批阶段','复审' ,'03','在办' from dual union select '审核' ,'审批阶段','审核' ,'03','在办' from dual union select '审核','审批阶段' ,'复核' ,'03','在办' from dual union select '登簿' ,'办结阶段','登簿' ,'04', '办结' from dual union select '登簿' ,'办结阶段','核定登簿' ,'04','办结' from dual ) c on B.Name_ = c.fromnodename WHERE A.BUSINESS_KEY_='{0}' AND A.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND NVL(A.DELETE_REASON_,'-1')!='ACTIVITI_DELETED' ORDER BY B.START_TIME_) d group by d.PHASE_NAME,d.PHASE_CODE, d.HANDLESTART,d.NODE_NAME ) d inner join bdcdj.slsq sl on sl.ywh=d.BUSINESS_KEY_ inner join bdcdwcx.qlsxdygx gx on gx.lcdm=sl.djxl AND SL.ssxzq = GX.QXDM

SELECT '' PROJID,'' PROJPWD,GX.SERVICECODE SERVICECODE,gx.ITEMID SERVICECODE_ID ,gx.SERVICEVERSION SERVICEVERSION ,gx.servicename SERVICENAME,D.NAME_ PROJECTNAME,'承诺件' INFOTYPE,'0' BUS_TYPE,'' REL_BUS_ID ,nvl(rtrim(ltrim(B.QLRMC)),'无') APPLYNAME,(select zwwyczjzl from BDCDWCX.zwwyczjzldzgx where zjzl=nvl(B.ZJZL,'99') and rownum=1) APPLY_CARDTYPE ,nvl(B.ZJH,'无') APPLY_CARDNUMBER,CASE WHEN B.QLRMC IS NOT NULL THEN B.QLRMC ELSE B.QLRDLRMC END AS CONTACTMAN ,CASE WHEN rtrim(ltrim(B.QLRMC)) IS NOT NULL THEN (select zwwyczjzl from BDCDWCX.zwwyczjzldzgx where zjzl= nvl(B.ZJZL,'99') and rownum=1) ELSE (select zwwyczjzl from BDCDWCX.zwwyczjzldzgx where zjzl=nvl(B.Qlrdlrzjzl,'99') and rownum=1) END AS CONTACTMAN_CARDTYPE ,nvl(ltrim(rtrim(CASE WHEN B.QLRMC IS NOT NULL THEN B.ZJH ELSE B.Qlrdlrzjh END)),'无') AS CONTACTMAN_CARDNUMBER,CASE WHEN B.YDDH IS NULL THEN NVL(B.GDDH,'2188256') ELSE B.YDDH END AS TELPHONE ,'' POSTCODE,'' ADDRESS,QLRFRMC LEGALMAN,QLRFRZJH XK_FR_SFZH ,gx.deptid DEPTID ,gx.deptname DEPTNAME ,gx.SS_ORGCODE SS_ORGCODE ,D.Start_User_Id_ RECEIVE_USEID,D.NAME_ RECEIVE_NAME,'4' RECEIVEUSEID_TYPE,'0' APPLYFROM ,'01' APPROVE_TYPE,'99' APPLY_PROPERTIY,TO_CHAR(A.START_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') RECEIVETIME,'' BELONGTO ,gx.AREACODE AREACODE ,'1' DATASTATE,gx.belongsystem BELONGSYSTEM,'' EXTEND ,TO_CHAR(A.START_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_TIME,'I' SYNC_STATUS,'1' DATAVERSION ,GX.DEPTID SERVICE_DEPTID,'00' BUS_MODE,GX.DEPTNAME XK_LYDW,GX.ss_orgcode XK_LYDWDM FROM GISQBPM.ACT_HI_PROCINST A INNER JOIN GISQBPM.ACT_HI_BIZ_PROCINST D ON D.PROC_INST_ID_=A.PROC_INST_ID_ INNER JOIN (select * from (SELECT * FROM BDCDJ.QLR WHERE YWH ='{0}' and QLRlb in('1','7','9','12') order by qszt, bsm desc) q where ROWNUM=1) B ON B.YWH=A.BUSINESS_KEY_ JOIN (SELECT DJXL,YWH,ssxzq FROM BDCDJ.SLSQ WHERE YWH ='{0}' AND ROWNUM=1) SL ON SL.YWH =B.YWH JOIN BDCDWCX.QLSXDYGX GX ON GX.LCDM=SL.DJXL AND SL.ssxzq = GX.QXDM WHERE A.BUSINESS_KEY_='{0}'

SELECT RAWTOHEX(SYS_GUID()) UNID,'' PROJID,C.DATUM_NAME ATTRNAME,C.DATUMINST_GUID ATTRID ,C.SEQ_ORDER SORTID,'纸质收取' TAKETYPE ,CASE WHEN NVL(C.ORIGINAL_NUMBER,0)+NVL(C.COPY_NUMBER,0)+NVL(C.ELEC_NUMBER,0)>0 THEN '1' ELSE '0' END AS ISTAKE,NVL(C.ORIGINAL_NUMBER,0)+NVL(C.COPY_NUMBER,0)+NVL(C.ELEC_NUMBER,0) AMOUNT ,TO_CHAR(C.GXSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') TAKETIME,'' MEMO, gx.belongsystem BELONGSYSTEM,'' EXTEND ,TO_CHAR(C.GXSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_TIME,A.BUSINESS_KEY_ FILENAME,'' FILEURL ,'I' SYNC_STATUS,'1' DATAVERSION , gx.AREACODE ,gx.servicecode,gx.deptid SERVICE_DEPTID,GX.DEPTNAME XK_LYDW,GX.ss_orgcode XK_LYDWDM FROM GISQBPM.ACT_HI_PROCINST A INNER JOIN BDCDJ.T_XM_PROJECT B ON A.BUSINESS_KEY_=B.PROJECT_ID INNER JOIN BDCDJ.T_XM_DATUM C ON C.BIZINST_GUID=B.BIZINST_GUID inner join BDCDJ.SLSQ sl on sl.ywh=a.BUSINESS_KEY_ inner join BDCDWCX.QLSXDYGX gx on gx.lcdm=sl.djxl AND SL.ssxzq = GX.QXDM WHERE A.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND NVL(A.DELETE_REASON_,'-1')!='ACTIVITI_DELETED' AND A.BUSINESS_KEY_='{0}'

SELECT '' PROJID,B.SLR ACCEPT_MAN,TO_CHAR(B.SLSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ACCEPT_TIME ,TO_CHAR(B.BLTS) PROMISEVALUE,'工作日' PROMISETYPE,TO_CHAR(B.BJSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') PROMISE_ETIME , gx.belongsystem BELONGSYSTEM,'' EXTEND,TO_CHAR(B.SLSJ,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_TIME ,'S' SYNC_STATUS,'1' DATAVERSION ,gx.deptname HANDER_DEPTNAME, gx.deptid HANDER_DEPTID,gx.AREACODE,gx.servicecode,gx.deptid SERVICE_DEPTID,GX.DEPTNAME XK_LYDW,GX.ss_orgcode XK_LYDWDM FROM GISQBPM.ACT_HI_PROCINST A INNER JOIN BDCDJ.SLSQ B ON B.YWH=A.BUSINESS_KEY_ inner join BDCDWCX.QLSXDYGX gx on gx.lcdm=b.djxl AND B.ssxzq = GX.QXDM WHERE A.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND NVL(A.DELETE_REASON_,'-1')!='ACTIVITI_DELETED' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM BDCDJ.SLSQ T WHERE T.YWH=B.YWH AND T.BSM<B.BSM) AND INSTR(A.BUSINESS_KEY_,'G')<=0 AND A.BUSINESS_KEY_='{0}' UNION ALL SELECT '' PROJID,'无' ACCEPT_MAN,TO_CHAR(A.START_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') ACCEPT_TIME ,'3' PROMISEVALUE,'工作日' PROMISETYPE,TO_CHAR(A.END_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') PROMISE_ETIME , gx.belongsystem BELONGSYSTEM,'' EXTEND,TO_CHAR(A.START_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_TIME ,'S' SYNC_STATUS,'1' DATAVERSION ,gx.deptname HANDER_DEPTNAME, gx.deptid HANDER_DEPTID,gx.AREACODE,gx.servicecode,gx.deptid SERVICE_DEPTID,GX.DEPTNAME XK_LYDW,GX.ss_orgcode XK_LYDWDM FROM GISQBPM.ACT_HI_PROCINST A inner join BDCDJ.SLSQ sl on sl.ywh=a.BUSINESS_KEY_ inner join BDCDWCX.QLSXDYGX gx on gx.lcdm=sl.djxl AND SL.ssxzq = GX.QXDM WHERE A.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND NVL(A.DELETE_REASON_,'-1')!='ACTIVITI_DELETED' AND INSTR(A.BUSINESS_KEY_,'G')>0 AND A.BUSINESS_KEY_='{0}'

select UNID,d.PROJID,ACTION ,NODE_NAME, NAME,OPINION,START_TIME, END_TIME, REMARK,EXTEND ,CREATE_TIME,SYNC_STATUS,DATAVERSION , gx.belongsystem BELONGSYSTEM,gx.deptname HANDER_DEPTNAME, gx.deptid HANDER_DEPTID,gx.AREACODE,gx.servicecode,gx.deptid SERVICE_DEPTID,GX.DEPTNAME XK_LYDW,GX.ss_orgcode XK_LYDWDM from ( SELECT RAWTOHEX(SYS_GUID()) UNID,'' PROJID,'提交' ACTION ,NODE_NAME,min(NAME) NAME,'同意' OPINION,min(START_TIME) START_TIME,max(END_TIME) END_TIME,'' REMARK,'' EXTEND ,min(CREATE_TIME) CREATE_TIME,'I' SYNC_STATUS,'1' DATAVERSION, min(BUSINESS_KEY_) BUSINESS_KEY_ from (select A.BUSINESS_KEY_, c.NODE_NAME,D.STAFF_NAME NAME ,TO_CHAR(B.START_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') START_TIME,TO_CHAR(B.END_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') END_TIME ,TO_CHAR(B.START_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_TIME FROM GISQBPM.ACT_HI_PROCINST A INNER JOIN GISQBPM.ACT_HI_TASKINST B ON A.PROC_INST_ID_=B.PROC_INST_ID_ INNER JOIN PLATFORM.BT_USER D ON D.USERNAME=B.ASSIGNEE_ inner join (select '受理' NODE_NAME,'受理' fromnodename from dual union select '受理' ,'收件受理' from dual union select '审核' ,'复审' from dual union select '审核' ,'审核' from dual union select '审核','复核' from dual union select '登簿' ,'登簿' from dual union select '登簿' ,'核定登簿' from dual ) c on B.Name_ = c.fromnodename WHERE A.BUSINESS_KEY_='{0}' AND A.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND NVL(A.DELETE_REASON_,'-1')!='ACTIVITI_DELETED' ORDER BY B.START_TIME_ ) d group by d.NODE_NAME ) d inner join bdcdj.slsq sl on sl.ywh=d.BUSINESS_KEY_ inner join bdcdwcx.qlsxdygx gx on gx.lcdm=sl.djxl AND SL.ssxzq = GX.QXDM

SELECT '' PROJID,D.STAFF_NAME TRANSACT_USER ,TO_CHAR(A.END_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') TRANSACT_TIME,'办结' TRANSACT_RESULT,'准予许可' TRANSACT_DESCRIBE ,''RESULT_CODE,'' REMARK, gx.belongsystem BELONGSYSTEM,'' EXTEND ,TO_CHAR(A.START_TIME_,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CREATE_TIME,'I' SYNC_STATUS,'1' DATAVERSION ,gx.deptname HANDER_DEPTNAME, gx.deptid HANDER_DEPTID,gx.AREACODE,gx.servicecode,gx.deptid SERVICE_DEPTID,GX.DEPTNAME XK_LYDW,GX.ss_orgcode XK_LYDWDM,GX.ss_orgcode XK_XKJGDM,'' XK_XKWS,'' XK_XKZS,TO_CHAR(A.END_TIME_,'YYYY/MM/DD') XK_YXQZ, '2099/12/31' XK_YXQZI FROM GISQBPM.ACT_HI_PROCINST A inner join BDCDJ.SLSQ sl on sl.ywh=a.BUSINESS_KEY_ inner join BDCDWCX.QLSXDYGX gx on gx.lcdm=sl.djxl AND SL.ssxzq = GX.QXDM INNER JOIN GISQBPM.ACT_HI_TASKINST B ON A.PROC_INST_ID_=B.PROC_INST_ID_ INNER JOIN PLATFORM.BT_USER D ON D.USERNAME=B.ASSIGNEE_ WHERE A.BUSINESS_KEY_='{0}' AND A.END_TIME_ IS NOT NULL AND NVL(A.DELETE_REASON_,'-1')!='ACTIVITI_DELETED' AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM GISQBPM.ACT_HI_TASKINST C WHERE C.PROC_INST_ID_=B.PROC_INST_ID_ AND C.END_TIME_>B.END_TIME_)
